ygData.subject: Re: Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The halfling clerics of Rivervale all worship Bristlebane.  There isn t a shrine to him per se, but that s where he s the center of the universe.  :) Jyzan
ygData.messageBody:
Bosmun wrote:

> From: "Bosmun" <bosmun@...>
>
> Hi all. My bard is a follower of Bristlebane, and I've been hoping to find
> a temple or shrine to him, so that I can make a journey there in game
> sometime, but I'm at a loss. Does anyone know if there are any temples or
> shrines to Bristlebane? I fear it may be in one of the evil cities, that I
> haven't visited yet.

The halfling clerics of Rivervale all worship Bristlebane. There isn't a shrine to him
per se, but that's where he's the center of the universe. :)

Jyzan
(also Pocapo - cleric of Bristlebane)
